summary: A band comprised of members of the Egyptian police force head to Israel to play at the inaugural ceremony of an Arab arts center, only to find themselves lost in the wrong town.
cast: Sasson Gabai|Ronit Elkabetz|Saleh Bakri|Khalifa Natour|Rubi Moskovitz|Uri Gavriel|Imad Jabarin|Hilla Sarjon|Shlomi Avraham|Tarik Kopty|Rinat Matatov|Tomer Yosef|Ahuva Keren|François Khell|Hisham Khoury|Eyad Sheety
keywords: putting one's hair under nose like a mustache|band|police|israel|arab
title: La banda nos visita
